## Welcome

This site hosts PCA plots, LD heatmaps, and LD network visualizations for major linkage disequilibrium (LD) clusters in *Saccharina latissima*.

It is intended as a browsable companion to genomic analyses of sugar kelp population structure and local adaptation.

## What you’ll find here

-   PCA plots for each LD cluster
-   LD heatmaps by scaffold and genomic window
-   LD network visualizations
-   Functional and molecular annotations
-   Searchable tables linking function to genomic regions

## Browse clusters

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(DT)

clusters <- readr::read_csv("data/clusters_metadata.csv", show_col_types = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(
    cluster_id = as.character(cluster_id),
    cluster_page = paste0("clusters/cluster_", cluster_id, ".html"),
    Region = paste0(start_bp, "–", end_bp),
    Cluster = sprintf('<a href="%s">%s</a>', cluster_page, cluster_id)
  ) %>%
  arrange(scaffold, start_bp) %>%
  select(
    Scaffold = scaffold,
    Cluster,
    `Region (bp)` = Region,
    `# SNPs` = n_snps
  )

DT::datatable(
  clusters,
  escape = FALSE,
  rownames = FALSE,
  options = list(pageLength = 25, autoWidth = TRUE)
)
```
